leaderSkill.name: Dark ATK & HP Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Dark element units have their Attack increased by 10% and max HP increased by 7%.

activeSkills.name: Unstable Blades
activeSkills.description: 1000% damage to 1 enemy. If the target is poisoned, this unit will get another turn after the attack. (Note: This skill scales strongly with poisoned enemies.)

activeSkills.name: Poison Waves
activeSkills.description: Removes all Poison Wards from all enemy units on the battlefield, and steals up to 5 Spirit from the enemy team. Then 1 random non-burning enemy is granted Lethal Poison for 999TU. Then 1 random non-poisoned enemy is granted Mega Poison for 200TU. Then 1 random non-poisoned enemy is granted Super Poison. Then 1 random non-poisoned enemy is granted Poison. This skill cannot be used again until 1 enemy turn has passed. If this skill is used 3 times within 10TU, this skill becomes locked for 50TU. Mega Poison, Super Poison, and Poison will overwrite other status effects on those enemies. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison. Super Poison deals 4 times the damage of normal poison, and cannot be overwritten by normal poison.

activeSkills.name: Toxic Burst
activeSkills.description: 1000% damage to 2 enemies. Minus 100% damage for each Spirit the enemy team has (max of -500% if the enemy team has 5+ Spirit). This attack ignores damage reduction effects, skin passive skills and the Counter Stance status effect. Then the targets hit have burn removed (including Mega Healing Burn). Then grants all hit Mega Poisoned enemies Lethal Poison for 999TU. Then grants Mega Poison for 200TU to all other enemies that were hit. Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects on the affected enemy, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning units or Boss units.

activeSkills.name: Rashomon
activeSkills.description: All non-boss, non-ephemeral enemies on the battlefield have a 50% chance each of being immediately defeated. This effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, and any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated. The user is considered to have defeated with attacks as many units as are defeated by this effect. After this skill is used, when the user is defeated by damage from an attack, a copy of the user is added to next in line of ally reinforcements with full health, and will then be considered a conjured unit. Unlocked after 5 or more non-conjured units on the battlefield are defeated or sacrificed by any source while this unit is on the battlefield. Usable once per battle.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Hypnotic Swordsman
passiveSkillDetails.description: This unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield. Each time this unit damages a poisoned enemy with an attack, this unit will be healed for 100% of its max HP. If this unit damages at least one poisoned enemy with an attack, this unit will get another turn. Damaged targets cannot trigger this effect again until TU advances. Effects that influence TU order may interrupt the extra turn (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target). The first time this unit is damaged by an attack while no enemies on the battlefield are Hypnotized, and no other \"Kenshin, Master of Rashomon Gate\" is on the battlefield, there is a 20% chance, plus 20% chance per Awakening (up to 100% chance if this unit has 4 Awakenings) for this unit to Hypnotize all enemies on the battlefield. A Hypnotized enemy will use its next turn to grant the turn to and Purify the hypnotizer (the turn will be lost as if it were sleeping), and then that unit's hypnosis will end. Hypnosis is not a status effect and cannot be removed by Purify skills, but will be canceled if the hypnotizer is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Hypnosis will fail against Boss units.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Gatekeeper
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit enters battle with Super Stealth, and a Stealth Shield. This unit cannot be defeated by damage from Poison status effects. While there is a poisoned enemy on the battlefield, this unit has Stun Immunity and Burn Immunity. Whenever a unit (ally or enemy) enters the battlefield from reinforcements, this unit will be healed for 100% of max HP and Purified (negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed). If this unit would be defeated, it instead survives with 1 HP, then until its next turn:
- this unit cannot be defeated.
- this unit heals for 10% of max HP at the end of every turn.
This is a Hold Ground+ effect, and ends after triggering once each time this unit enters the battlefield. Whenever this unit defeats an enemy with an attack or Rashomon, this Hold Ground+ effect is reset so it can trigger.

passiveSkillDetails.name: HP Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Attack Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 300 to this unit's Attack.

passiveSkillDetails.name: G.axe Hunter Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: 10% bonus to attacks against units equipped with Greataxes.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Greatsword Mastery
passiveSkillDetails.description: Can use weapon skills of Greatswords in addition to their original preferred weapon type.

poison_apply: Poison Waves: applies Poison/Super Poison/Mega Poison/Lethal Poison to enemies
poison_payoff: Hypnotic Swordsman: heals + extra turn when damaging poisoned enemies
Unstable Blades: extra turn condition on poisoned target
Toxic Burst: upgrades Mega Poisoned enemies into Lethal Poison
poison_ward_break: Poison Waves: removes all Poison Wards from enemies
burn_cleanse: Toxic Burst: removes burn from targets hit
spirit_steal: Poison Waves: steals up to 5 Spirit from enemy team
stealth: Gatekeeper: enters with Super Stealth and Stealth Shield
purify: Gatekeeper: self-purifies when units enter from reinforcements
stun_immunity: Gatekeeper: stun immunity while a poisoned enemy exists
burn_immunity: Gatekeeper: burn immunity while a poisoned enemy exists
hold_ground: Gatekeeper: Hold Ground+ style survival and reset on kills

leaderSkill.name: Dark Attack Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Dark element units have their Attack increased by 15%.

activeSkills.name: Oni Claws
activeSkills.description: 300% damage to 1 enemy, plus 100% for each time this unit has defeated an enemy with an attack while on the battlefield (max of 700% total damage after defeating 4 enemies). This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects and any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated. The user is granted Stealth, and a Stealth Shield. Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on the user. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.

activeSkills.name: -1 Absolute Slaughter
activeSkills.description: 300% damage to 1 enemy. This attack ignores Guardians, damage reduction effects, the Counter Stance Status Effect, and the effects of Skin passive skills. Damage from this attack does not wake up sleeping enemies. When this attack hits a non-boss, non-Ephemeral target and that target has 10% or less of max HP remaining after damage, that target is immediately defeated (the user is considered to have defeated the target with an attack if successful). This effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, and any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the enemy from being defeated. Usable 10 times per battle.

activeSkills.name: -1 Void Push
activeSkills.description: Targets 1 enemy. Steals up to 1 Spirit from the enemy team for each enemy on the battlefield. Enemy Imposters are counted twice. Then exchanges the target with an Imposter. The exchanged enemy will be sent to a random place in line of enemy reinforcements. If there are no enemy reinforcements, add enough Imposters to the enemy team to still send the targeted enemy to reinforcements (max 3). This effect will not trigger if the targeted enemy is Immovable. Usable only if there are at least 2 non-Imposter enemies on the battlefield and becomes locked for 50TU after use.

activeSkills.name: -1 Dark Heaven Style
activeSkills.description: The user will enter Dark Heaven Stance for 150TU. While in Dark Heaven Stance, this unit heals for 50% of max HP at the end of each turn, will ignore attacks that would damage exactly 2 targets (attacks that target All allies will not be ignored), and this unit's Attack is increased to 1.5x. This attack increase does not stack with Enrage effects. This skill becomes locked for 150TU after use. Usable if this unit has not defeated any units with attacks while on the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Merciless Musashi
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit's attacks heal this unit for 100% of total damage dealt. This unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield. Until the end of this unit's first turn while on the battlefield, this unit has Stun Immunity and Sleep Immunity. Afterwards, this unit has Stun Immunity and Sleep Immunity for 100TU. Each time this unit damages an enemy with an attack, this unit will immediately get the next turn if either that enemy had 100% of their max HP at the start of the turn, or if the damage leaves them on or below 25% of max HP (even if they are defeated by the attack).
- This effect cannot trigger again against the same target until TU advances.
- Effects that influence TU order may interrupt the extra turn (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target).

passiveSkillDetails.name: Blood of the Oni
passiveSkillDetails.description: If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP. Whenever this unit defeats a non-conjured enemy with an attack, an Imposter is added to the next in line of enemy reinforcements. At the start of each turn, if there are any Imposters (ally or enemy) on the battlefield, this unit cannot be defeated by non-attack damage until the end of that turn. Whenever an imposter on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source, this unit will be healed for 100% max HP and Purified (negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed).

activeSkills.name: Heartfelt Strike
activeSkills.description:
600% damage to 1 enemy. Minus 100% damage for each sleeping, burning or poisoned ally on the battlefield (max of -400% if there are 4 affected allies). This attack ignores damage reduction effects, skin passive skills and the Counter Stance status effect. Heals the user for 100% of total damage dealt. Damage from this attack does not wake up sleeping enemies.

Then the target hit will become Weakened, and is granted a Rage ward. This will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on that unit.

Weakened units have their Attack reduced to 0.75x until the end of their next turn. The effect of Weakening may be diminished if the affected unit's Attack is increased by other effects and it can be overwritten by Enrage effects. Rage Wards will prevent a unit from becoming Enraged once, then be removed. Rage Wards cannot stack.

activeSkills.name: Goddess Charm
activeSkills.description:
All enemies on the battlefield have their Stealth, Poison Wards, Sleep Wards and Stun Wards removed.

Then all enemies on the battlefield have a 50% chance each to be Charmed for 50TU. A Charmed unit has their attack greatly reduced (e.g. to 0.5x of their original Attack for a unit with no other Attack modifiers. The effect of Charmed may be diminished if the affected unit's Attack is increased by other effects). Charmed overwrites Enrage and Weaken effects, and units that are Charmed cannot be Enraged or Weakened. Charmed units are less likely to target the unit that Charmed them with most active skills. Charmed is not a status effect and cannot be removed by Purify skills, but will end if the Charmed unit leaves the battlefield.

This skill cannot be used if an enemy is already Charmed or if the user is alone on the battlefield.

activeSkills.name: Overflowing Love
activeSkills.description:

Then all allies are Purified (any negative status effects are removed).

Usable if an ally on the battlefield is burning, sleeping or poisoned. This skill becomes locked for 50TU after use.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Goddess Of Love
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield.

This unit has 50% damage reduction from attacks, plus 10% for each other ally on the battlefield (up to 80% max).

Until the end of this unit's first turn while on the battlefield, this unit has Sleep immunity, Stun Immunity, Poison Immunity and Burn Immunity.

This unit will have a 60% chance, plus 10% per Awakening (up to 100% chance if this unit has 4 Awakenings) to become Purified and have its TU reduced to 0, at the end of the turn, whenever a Charmed enemy gets the turn. If this is triggered 3 times within 50TU, it cannot trigger again for 50TU.

This unit cannot be Charmed.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Boundless Beauty
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit enters battle with 2 Charges. If this unit would be defeated while it has any charges, this unit will consume 1 charge to survive with 1HP remaining instead. Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges.

This unit will gain a Charge at the end of the turn each time:
- an ally gets the turn.
- a non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source.

If this unit has at least:
- 2 Charges, it will ignore attacks that would damage exactly 2 targets. Attacks that target all allies will not be ignored.
- 3 Charges at the start of its turn, this unit will Enrage all allies on the battlefield at the end of that turn. An Enraged unit's attack is increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn. Enrage will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on the user.

Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will be Purified, and heal for 50% of its max HP. This heal is increased to 100% if this unit has any allies on the battlefield or in reinforcements.

activeSkills.name: Restore Link
activeSkills.description:
Grants Rizette's Link to another random non-conjured ally that does not already have a Link.

Then that ally and the user:
- are healed for 100% max HP.
- have the TU costs for all of their skills reduced by 30%. This will overwrite the effects of other Quicken skills.
- are granted a Sleep Ward, Stun Ward, Poison Ward and Instant Death Ward.

Usable only if no other ally on the battlefield has Rizette's Link already, and there is a valid target. Usable 3 times per battle.

Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. An Instant Death Ward prevents this unit from being immediately defeated without damage by a non-boss enemy once, then is removed. Instant Death Wards cannot be ignored. Identical Wards cannot stack.

activeSkills.name: Elemental Cure
activeSkills.description:
Heals all allies on the battlefield for 800% of the user's attack. Allies gain 2 Spirit for each ally on the battlefield with Rizette's Link.

Then if at least 1 enemy on the battlefield is:
- Water, remove sleep (including Deep Sleep) from all allies on the battlefield and grant them Sleep Wards.
- Fire, remove burn (including Mega Healing Burn) from all units on the battlefield and grant them Burn Wards.
- Earth, remove poison (including Lethal Poison) from all allies on the battlefield and grant them Poison Wards.
- Storm, all allies who have a current TU of 100 or more have their current TU reduced by 50TU. This effect repeats once for each additional Storm enemy on the battlefield. Then grant all allies Stun Wards.
- Dark, grant all allies Stealth, and a Stealth Shield.
- Light, all allies will be Purified (negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed). Then if there is no Purify Chain among allies a random ally is granted a Purify Chain.

This skill becomes locked for 50TU after use.

Purify Chains will end only if the unit with the Purify Chain is defeated, leaves the battlefield, or falls asleep.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Instant Link
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit starts with Rizette's Link. When this unit enters battle it grants Rizette's Link to another random non-conjured ally that does not have a Link already. Then that ally and this unit have the TU costs for all of their skills reduced by 30% (This will overwrite the effects of other Quicken skills), and are granted a Sleep Ward, Stun Ward, Poison Ward and Instant Death Ward.

A unit with Rizette's Link has these effects:

Each time an ally with Rizette's Link gets the turn, this unit will be healed for 50% of its max HP.

This unit has 0.25x of their original Attack added to their Attack while they are not Enraged. This increase will stack with other Attack increases (e.g. 1.5x + 0.25x => 1.75x total).

When this unit defeats an enemy with an attack, if the defeated enemy is:
- Fire or Light, 2 random non-sleeping enemies gain the Sleep status effect for 100TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield.
- Storm or Earth, 2 random non-burning enemies gain the Lethal Poison status effect.
- Water or Dark, 2 random enemies that have a current TU of 50 or less are stunned for 100TU.
These effects may trigger before or after other effects.

This Link is removed if this unit or the unit that granted it leaves the battlefield. This unit cannot gain other Links.

Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects, lasts 999 TU, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison, and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning or Boss units.

This unit has Sleep immunity and Stun immunity. These immunity effects are removed from this unit if this is the only ally on the battlefield with Rizette's Link (these immunity effects cannot be restored).

passiveSkillDetails.name: Godly Lightning
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit's attacks ignore Guardians and heal this unit for 100% of total damage dealt.

This unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield.

This unit has Sleep immunity and Stun immunity. These immunity effects are removed from this unit when this unit activates Zeus's Blessing.

When this unit takes damage from an attack, they will immediately get the next turn, this cannot trigger again until TU advances. This is a skin effect. This unit cannot become a Guardian or Stun Absorber.

This unit enters battle with 3 Charges. Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges.

At the end of this unit's turn, if this unit has exactly:
- 3 Charges, all enemies on the battlefield that have a current TU of 50 or less are stunned for 100TU.
- 2 Charges, all enemies on the battlefield that have a current TU of 100 or less are stunned for 200TU.
- 1 Charge, all enemies on the battlefield that have a current TU of 200 or less are stunned for 300TU.
Then a Charge is consumed by this unit.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Omnipotence
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

Each time a unit gets the turn, this unit will be healed for 30% of its max HP.

After entering battle, this unit cannot be burned for 200TU.

Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will heal for 50% of its max HP and be Purified (any negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed).

This unit's attack has 0.25x of their original Attack added to their Attack for each enemy on the battlefield that has a current TU of 50 or less (max of 1.0x if 4 enemies have a current TU of 50 or less). This does stack on top of Enrage effects, and other Attack increases (e.g. 1.5x + 0.25x => 1.75x total).

passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

Grants the Sleep status effect for 100TU to one other enemy per Charge stored on the user (max of 3 targets), even if they have already slept while on the battlefield.

activeSkills.name: Icy Awakening
activeSkills.description:
Heals the user fully. The user is granted a Charge, Sleep Ward, Poison Ward, and the Armor status effect. Armor will overwrite other status effects. Then the user is Enraged, and will Endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1HP.

Unlocked each time the user defeats a non-conjured enemy on the battlefield with an attack. This skill is locked again after each use.

Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards and Endure effects cannot stack. Armor grants 50% damage reduction from the next attack, then the effect is removed. An Enraged unit's attack is increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn. Enrage will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on the user.

activeSkills.description: 200% damage to 2 enemies, plus 200% for each time this unit has defeated an enemy with an attack while on the battlefield (max of 800% total damage after defeating 3 enemies). Locked for 100TU after the user has entered the battlefield or until a non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source. Usable once per battle.

When a unit has Frostburn and they get the turn, they will lose the turn as if they were sleeping, then Frostburn is removed and that unit is granted the Burn status effect. Frostburn is not a status effect, but effects that remove negative status effects will also remove Frostburn. Frostburn will end if the affected unit is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Frostburn cannot apply to boss units, and cannot stack. Burn will overwrite other status effects. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with burn will also become burned.

This unit's active skills all cost 25% less TU for each charge it has stored, up to 75% less max with 3 charges. Other effects that further reduce TU will have diminishing returns while this is in effect.

- this unit gains the Armor status effect, and is healed for 100% of max HP.

- 2 random allies on the battlefield have their current TU reduced by 50TU.

Burn or attacks that grant Burn will remove Sleep Thorns and prevent Cursed Sleep from applying. Cursed Sleep will overwrite status effects other than Burn, cannot be overwritten by Poison, can be applied repeatedly to units that have already slept while on the battlefield, and will not end from damage caused by Dream Hunter type active skills.

Heated Barrier's effect can stack with other damage reduction effects such as this passive skill's damage reduction effect, but will not stack with itself or other ally Barrier type skills. Heated Barrier are removed from units that leave the battlefield.

Whenever a non-conjured enemy on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source, all allies are healed for 100% of max HP. Then all allies that are Fire element or have a Burn Blast or Burn Drive type active skill are granted the Burn status effect.

activeSkills.description:
Grants all enemies the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield. This will overwrite other status effects on those units.

Then if any enemy on the battlefield is not asleep (e.g. due to a Sleep Ward), all non-sleeping enemies are granted Frostburn, and the user will immediately get the next turn. This skill becomes locked for 150TU after use.

When a unit has Frostburn and they get the turn, they will lose the turn as if they were sleeping, then Frostburn is removed and that unit is granted the Burn status effect. Frostburn is not a status effect, but effects that remove negative status effects will also remove Frostburn. Frostburn will end if the affected unit is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Frostburn cannot apply to boss units, and cannot stack. Burn will overwrite other status effects. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with burn will also become burned.

- this unit heals for 25% of max HP.

activeSkills.description:

Then the user is granted Healing Burn for 300TU, all other allies heal for 1000% of the user's attack, and Allies gain 1 Spirit for each unit on the battlefield that is burning. This skill becomes locked for 100TU after use.

A unit with Healing Burn will heal after each turn at the same rate as Burn would deal damage instead of taking damage from Burn. Healing Burn will overwrite other status effects on the user and can replace the Burn status effect, but cannot be replaced by Burn. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with Healing Burn will gain the Burn status effect. Healing Burn will not be removed by Purify skills.

This unit is a Guardian. For any enemy attack that would hit 1 or 2 other allies, this unit has a 100% chance to redirect 1 hit to itself instead. This unit will not redirect skills that don't deal damage.

This unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield.

This unit cannot be defeated if it has the Mega Healing Burn status effect.

This unit enters battle with Mega Healing Burn for 100TU, and an Instant Death Ward.

At the end of each of the first 3 turns this unit gets on the battlefield:
- Burn all units on the battlefield. This will overwrite other status effects on those units.
- Then this unit is granted Mega Healing Burn for 100TU.
- Then this unit is granted an Instant Death Ward.

An Instant Death Ward prevents this unit from being immediately defeated without damage by a non-boss enemy once, then is removed. Instant Death Wards cannot be ignored and cannot stack. A unit with Mega Healing Burn will heal after each turn at 20 times the rate as Healing Burn. This will overwrite other status effects including Healing Burn on the user, cannot be overwritten by Burn, Poison or Sleep status effects, and cannot be Purified. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with Mega Healing Burn will gain the Burn status effect. A unit with Mega Healing Burn will be granted Healing Burn for 300TU when Mega Healing Burn expires.

Until this unit has survived for 150TU on the battlefield, this unit has 80% damage reduction from attacks. Afterwards, this unit has 40% damage reduction from attacks.

If this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn:
- this unit will heal for 10% of max HP for each burning ally on the battlefield (max 40%).
- a random burning non-guardian ally will immediately get the turn by having its TU reduced to 0. Active skills that grant turns cannot be used by any affected units until after they have had the turn.

activeSkills.description:

If that enemy is not burning, they will also be granted the Lethal Poison status effect, and become infected with it. This attack ignores damage reduction effects, skin passive skills and the Counter Stance status effect.

After the end of each turn, this infection will trigger to apply Lethal Poison to a random non-burning, non-Lethal Poisoned unit on the infected unit's team. Infection ends after 3 triggers (even if they find no valid target) or once the infected enemy is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Infection is not a status effect and cannot be prevented or purified, but the status effect spread by the infection may be. A unit cannot get a new infection until their existing one ends.

Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects, lasts 999 TU, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison, and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning or Boss units.

When the user activates this skill a third time, a random non-boss, non-Ephemeral enemy on or below 25% of max HP and on the battlefield will be immediately defeated (the user is considered to have defeated that enemy with an attack). This secondary effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, and any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the random enemy from being defeated.

This skill is locked until the user's Hold Ground+ passive skill effect is triggered while on the battlefield and is locked again after each use. This skill can be used only three times per battle.

Identical Wards cannot stack.

While Overclocked, this unit heals for 25% of max HP at the end of each turn, cannot fall asleep, and has its Attack increased to 1.5x. This attack increase does not stack with Enrage effects. This skill can only be used once each time this unit is on the battlefield.

activeSkills.name: CODE: DELETE
activeSkills.description: 300% damage to 1 enemy, plus 150% for each Charge stored on the user (max of 750% total damage). This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects and any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated.

activeSkills.name: Phase Out
activeSkills.description:
Exchanges 1 random enemy with an Imposter. The exchanged enemy will be sent to the front of the enemy reinforcements. This exchange will fail if the target is Immovable or if there are less than 4 enemies on the battlefield (no imposter will be added).

Then pulls the user away from the battlefield to the front of your reinforcements. If there are no ally reinforcements, adds enough Elmina's (max 3) to the ally team to still pull the user away to reinforcements.

Usable if the user has defeated 1+ units with attacks while on the battlefield, and there are 2 non-conjured allies on the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Photon Splitter
activeSkillDetails.description: 200% damage to 2 enemies, plus 150% for each Charge stored on the user (max of 650% total damage). This attack ignores any enemy status effects (including Stealth), damage reduction effects, and skin passive skills. Heals the user for 100% of total damage dealt. Damage from this attack does not wake up sleeping enemies.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Cyber Doubles
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit is not affected by stun effects.

When this unit enters battle:
- If this unit is not conjured, it will have Hold Ground (If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP).
- If this unit is not conjured and if there are 4 allies on the battlefield, an Elmina will be added to the front of allied reinforcements.
- If this unit is conjured, this unit will Endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1HP. Endure effects cannot stack.

This unit will gain a Charge each time it attacks and does not defeat any non-conjured enemies.

Whenever this unit defeats any number of non-conjured enemies with an attack:
- An Elmina will be added to the front of allied reinforcements. This effect cannot trigger if there are 8 or more "Elmina, Moonveiled Agent" in the ally team.
- Then all charges are removed from this unit.

Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store up to 3 charges and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield. All Elmina's created by this unit will have matching Levels, Limit Breaks, Awakenings, Boosts, Potential, Mastery, Weapons, and Accessories.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Hyper Drive
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit entered from reinforcements, the following effects are triggered when this unit activates Limiter Release, and the first time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn:
- All allies will be Purified (any negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed), and heal for 100% of max HP.
- Then all other ally units will be given the next turns by having their TU reduced. Active skills that grant turns cannot be used by those allies until after they have had the turn.

Each time this unit damages at least one enemy with an attack and leaves them on or below 25% of max HP (even if they are defeated by the attack), this unit will get another turn. Damaged targets cannot trigger this effect again until TU advances.

Effects that influence TU order may interrupt extra turns (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target).

passiveSkillDetails.name: HP Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Attack Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 300 to this unit's Attack.

passiveSkillDetails.name: G.axe Resist Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: 10% less damage from attacks by units equipped with Greataxes.

leaderSkill.name: Dark ATK & HP Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Dark element units have their Attack increased by 10% and max HP increased by 7%.

activeSkills.name: Demonic Defiance
activeSkills.description:
Heals all allies for 800% of the user's attack. Then grants all allies Stealth, a Stealth Shield, Poison Ward, Stun Ward and Burn Ward. Unlocks at random either Toxic Reign or Demon Blast. This skill becomes locked after use until the user uses the Toxic Finale skill or leaves the battlefield.

Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack. Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on affected units. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.

activeSkills.name: Toxic Reign
activeSkills.description:
Removes Burn (including Mega Healing Burn) and Stealth Shields from all enemy units on the battlefield. Then all enemies are granted Mega Poison for 200TU, and Burn Wards. Then 1 random enemy is granted Lethal Poison for 999TU. This skill is locked until it becomes unlocked by Demonic Defiance, and unlocks Toxic Finale upon use. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on those enemies. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison. Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects on the affected enemy, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning units or Boss units.

activeSkills.name: Demon Blast
activeSkills.description: 300% damage to 2 enemies. This attack ignores damage reduction effects, any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated, skin passive skills and the Counter Stance status effect. This skill is locked until it becomes unlocked by Demonic Defiance, and unlocks Toxic Finale upon use. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

activeSkills.name: Toxic Finale
activeSkills.description: 350% damage to 2 enemies. 700% damage instead to targets that are poisoned. All non-poisoned enemies hit are then granted Lethal Poison for 999TU. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects. This skill is locked until it becomes unlocked by Toxic Reign or Demon Blast. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield. This skill unlocks Demonic Defiance after use.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Dark Divinity
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

While there is a poisoned enemy on the battlefield, this unit is not affected by stun effects.

This unit enters battle with a Poison Ward, Sleep Ward, and Stun Ward.

At the end of each of this unit's turns:
- A random ally on the battlefield is healed for 30% of max HP.
- A random ally on the battlefield is Enraged. This will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects.
- A random ally on the battlefield will have its TU costs for all of its skills reduced by 20%. This will overwrite the effect of previous quicken skills.

Enraged units have their Attack increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Divine Darkness
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit has 35% damage reduction from attacks, plus 10% for each poisoned enemy on the battlefield (up to 75% max).

When this unit takes damage from an attack:
- If this unit survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will heal for 30% of max HP and be granted Stealth.
- If at the start of the turn there were no poisoned enemies and this unit had another ally on the battlefield, this unit will have its TU reduced to 0.

At the end of each of this unit's turns:
- A random enemy on the battlefield is granted Super Poison.
- A random enemy on the battlefield is Weakened.
- This unit steals up to 1 Spirit from the enemy team.

Weakened units have their Attack reduced to 0.75x until the end of their next turn. This effect will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on affected units. The effect of Weakening may be diminished if the affected unit's Attack is increased by other effects and it can be overwritten by Enrage effects. Super Poison will overwrite other status effects on affected enemies. Super Poison deals 4 times the damage of normal poison, and cannot be overwritten by normal poison.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Tides of Fortune
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit cannot be burned. This unit's attacks will not wake sleeping enemies.

This unit has 40% damage reduction from attacks, plus 10% for each burning or sleeping enemy on the battlefield (up to 80% max).

When this unit takes damage from an attack, if there are 2 or more enemies that are burning or sleeping on the battlefield, this unit has a 20% chance plus 20% per Awakening (up to 100% chance if this unit has 4 Awakenings) to be immediately Purified (any negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed, new status effects may still apply following this effect), and get the next turn.

When this unit enters the battlefield and at the end of each turn, if there are 2 or more enemies on the battlefield that are Fire element or have a Burn Blast or Burn Drive type active skill, this unit will become a Stun Absorber (Whenever any ally would be affected by stun, this unit takes the stun instead). At the end of each turn, if there are less than 2 enemies on the battlefield that are Fire element or have a Burn Blast or Burn Drive type active skill, this unit will stop being a Stun Absorber.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Captain's Orders
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

Each time an ally (including this unit) gets the turn, they will heal for 20% of their max HP. If that ally is Water and survives until after the end of the turn, Allies gain 1 Spirit.

When this unit's attacks hit a sleeping, non-boss, non-Ephemeral target and that target has 1HP remaining after damage, that target is immediately defeated (this unit is considered to have defeated that enemy with an attack). This effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, and any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the enemy from being defeated.

When this unit enters battle all allies will be granted Sleep Wards. After the end of this unit's first turn on the battlefield, all allies will have Burn removed and be granted Burn wards. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

Then, the hit enemy will have 1 Discharge Counter removed.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Undying Storm
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

This unit gains 20% damage reduction from attacks for each ally on the battlefield (up to 80% max). Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will heal for 50% of its max HP.

Whenever this unit defeats any number of enemies with an attack, a random enemy will be stunned for 100TU.

If this unit has survived on the battlefield for 300TU or more, this unit's attacks will ignore any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated.

passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 300 to this unit's Attack.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Axe Resist Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: 10% less damage from attacks by units equipped with Axes.

leaderSkill.name: Earth ATK & HP Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Earth element units have their Attack increased by 10% and max HP increased by 7%.

activeSkills.name: Lock Breaker
activeSkills.description:
200% damage to 1 enemy. 500% damage instead if the target does not have the Burn status effect. Grants the user Stealth, and a Stealth Shield. Randomly grants either Stun Wards, Sleep Wards, or Poison Wards to all allies. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects, the Counter Stance Status Effect, and the effects of Skin passive skills. Damage from this attack does not wake up sleeping enemies.

Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on the user. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

activeSkills.name: Cursed Roots
activeSkills.description:
Steals up to 1 Spirit from the enemy team for each non-burning enemy on the battlefield, and all non-burning allies are granted Sleep Thorns. Then heals all allies for 500% of the user's attack, and Purifies them (removes negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison). This skill locks after use, and unlocks each time a non-conjured enemy on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source.

When a unit with Sleep Thorns is dealt damage by an attack, that unit's Sleep Thorns will be consumed to immediately grant the Cursed Sleep status effect for 200TU to the attacker. Burn or attacks that grant Burn will remove Sleep Thorns and prevent Cursed Sleep from applying. Cursed Sleep will overwrite status effects other than Burn, cannot be overwritten by Poison, can be applied repeatedly to units that have already slept while on the battlefield, and will not end from damage caused by Dream Hunter type active skills.

activeSkills.name: Poison Memories
activeSkills.description:
Removes all Poison wards and Stealth Shields from enemy units on the battlefield. Then all non-sleeping enemies have a 50% chance each to be granted Lethal Poison for 999TU. Then all non-sleeping enemies are granted Mega Poison for 200TU. This skill becomes locked for 100TU after use.

Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on those enemies. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison. Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects on those enemies, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning units or Boss units.

activeSkills.description: 200% damage to all enemies. 400% damage instead to targets that are poisoned. 600% damage instead to targets that have the Mega Poison status effect. 800% damage instead to targets that have the Lethal Poison status effect. All non-sleeping enemies hit are then granted Mega Poison for 200TU. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects, the Counter Stance Status Effect, and the effects of Skin passive skills. activeSkills.name: Piercing Heat
activeSkills.description:

This unit cannot be defeated by damage from Burn status effects, and cannot be Stunned. This unit enters battle with the Mega Healing Burn status effect for 100TU.

This unit gains 20% damage reduction from attacks for each burning ally on the battlefield (up to 80% max).

When another non-conjured unit (ally or enemy) on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source, this unit gains a Charge. Certain skills are affected by charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

A unit with Mega Healing Burn will heal after each turn at 20 times the rate as Healing Burn. This will overwrite other status effects on the unit, cannot be overwritten by Burn, Poison or Sleep status effects, and cannot be Purified. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with Mega Healing Burn will gain the Burn status effect. A unit with Mega Healing Burn will be granted Healing Burn for 300TU when Mega Healing Burn expires.

If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

When another non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source, immediately give 1 other random burning ally the next turn by reducing their current TU to 0. This will not trigger if this unit is defeated or sacrificed at the same time. Active skills that grant turns cannot be used on turns given by this skill.

Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn with more than 1 HP, this unit will:
- Grant a random non-burning ally and non-burning enemy the Burn status effect. This is not a Skin passive skill.
- Then heal for 10% of max HP (up to 80% max) for each burning unit on the battlefield.

Whenever there are 3 or more burning allies on the battlefield, this unit will survive any attack that would defeat this unit with 1HP.

Each time this unit gets the turn, all allies will heal for 30% of their max HP.

At the end of each of this unit's turns:
- If this unit has a Power Charge, all allies will become Enraged, then the Power Charge is removed from this unit.
- Otherwise, this unit will gain a Power Charge.

An Enraged unit's attack is increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn. Enrage will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on affected units. Power Charges cannot stack and will be removed when the user leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit has 10% bonus to attacks for each burning unit on the battlefield (up to 80% max).

- This unit and another random ally are granted Instant Death Wards.
- All units on the battlefield are granted the Burn status effect. This effect triggers 2 times.
- Then all burning units on the battlefield are Stunned for 50TU. This effect triggers 2 times.

An Instant Death Ward prevents a unit from being immediately defeated without damage by a non-boss enemy once, then is removed. Instant Death Wards cannot be ignored and cannot stack.

passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit's attacks will not wake sleeping enemies. Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will heal for 30% of its max HP.

Until the end of this unit's third turn while on the battlefield:
- This unit is immune to Poison and Sleep status effects.
- This unit is immune to Stun effects unless it is burning.
- Unless it is burning, this unit has 80% damage reduction and has a 60% chance, plus 10% chance per Awakening (up to 100% if this unit has 4 Awakenings) to survive any damage that would defeat it with 1HP.

Until the end of this unit's second turn while on the battlefield, each time this unit takes damage from an attack, a random non-burning enemy is immediately granted Cursed Sleep for 200TU, then a random non-burning enemy immediately becomes Lethal Poisoned for 999TU. This is not a Skin passive skill.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Time Warp
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Triggered when this unit enters the battlefield from the allied reinforcements:
- Until the end of this unit's first turn while on the battlefield, this unit will become a Guardian.
- All allies are Purified (any negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed).
- All other allies that are at max HP have their TUs reduced to 0. This has no effect on allies that are either Fire element or have Burn Blast or Burn Drive type active skills. These extra turns may be interrupted by other effects that influence the turn order (e.g. stuns targeting the lowest TU target). Active skills that grant turns cannot be used by any affected units until after they have had the turn.

After each enemy turn, a random sleeping or poisoned ally will have their Sleep or Poison (including Lethal Poison) removed and be granted a ward for the effect removed (a Poison Ward or Sleep Ward).

Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack. While this unit is a Guardian, for any enemy attack that would hit 1 or 2 other allies, this unit has a 100% chance to redirect 1 hit to itself instead. This unit will not redirect skills that don't deal damage.

If Time Stop is not active, Stuns the target for 300TU, then if the hit target has 200TU or more and is not a Stun Absorber, they can no longer be Stunned by this active skill unless they leave the battlefield.

activeSkills.name: Time Stop
activeSkills.description:
Activates Time Stop For 100TU. While Time Stop is active, the user:
- Cannot be defeated by Poison or Burn damage (including Lethal Poison).
- Is immune to Poison, and Burn status effects.
- Has their Active Skill TU Costs reduced by 50%. This does not stack with Quicken effects.
- Disables the Active Skills of all other units on the battlefield (including new units that enter from reinforcements).

When Time Stop expires, all allies will be healed for 100% of max HP and be Purified (any negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed), and all non-boss enemies on the battlefield that are below 10% of their max HP will be immediately defeated (the user is considered to have defeated those enemies with an attack). This effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, and any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the enemy from being defeated. Time Stop expiring may trigger before or after other effects.

Usable once per battle. The effects of Time Stop cannot be Purified and will be cancelled if the user is defeated. When a unit's Active Skills are disabled and they get the turn, they will lose the turn as if they were sleeping.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Primordial Might

Then If Allies have 10 Spirit, this Hold Ground+ effect is reset so it can trigger again.

- will have Sleep and Poison status effects other than Lethal Poison removed.
- may gain a Sleep Ward, Stun Ward and a Poison Ward (50% chance for each ward).
This effect will end if this unit leaves the battlefield. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

If all allies on the battlefield are at max HP when this unit enters battle, this unit gains a Power Charge and Intense Rage. Otherwise, all allies are healed for 100% of their max HP, Purified, and may gain a Sleep Ward, Stun Ward, and a Poison Ward (50% chance for each ward).

activeSkills.name: Lethal Plague
activeSkills.description:
Grants 1 enemy the Lethal Poison status effect, and Infects them with it.

After the end of each turn, this infection will trigger to apply Lethal Poison to a random non-burning, non-Lethal Poisoned unit on the infected unit's team. Infection ends after 3 triggers (even if they find no valid target) or once the infected enemy is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Infection is not a status effect and cannot be prevented or purified, but the status effect spread by the infection may be. A unit cannot get a new infection until their existing one ends.

This skill is locked for 100TU after use. Usable 5 times per battle.

Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects, lasts 999 TU, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison, and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning or Boss units.

Then the target hit has its Poison Wards removed, burn removed (including Mega Healing Burn) and is randomly granted either Super Poison, Mega Poison for 200TU, or Lethal Poison for 999TU. This will overwrite other status effects on that enemy. If this skill is used 3 times within 10TU, it becomes locked for 50TU.

Super Poison deals 4 times the damage of normal poison, and cannot be overwritten by normal poison. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison.

activeSkillDetails.name: Divine Lightning
activeSkillDetails.description:
Targets all enemies and deals 100% damage. For each target with 50+ TU, deals 400% damage to that target instead. For each target with 100+ TU, deals 600% damage to that target instead. This attack ignores damage reduction effects, skin passive skills and the Counter Stance status effect.

Then, all non-boss, non-Ephemeral enemies hit that have 1HP remaining have a 25% chance each to be immediately defeated (the user is considered to have defeated that enemy with an attack). This secondary effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, and any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the enemy from being defeated. Usable once each time this unit is on the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Call the Storm
activeSkillDetails.description: Pulls the user away from the battlefield to be next in line of your reinforcements. If there are no ally reinforcements, adds enough Super Denmoris to the ally team to still pull the user away to reinforcements (max 4 if the user is alone on the battlefield). Usable if the user has used Divine Lightning while on the battlefield. Usable five times per battle.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Lightning Rain
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Triggered when this unit enters the battlefield from the allied reinforcements:
- Stuns 2 random enemies for 150TU.
- Purifies all allies.
- Grants the ally with the lowest TU the next turn by reducing their current TU to 0.

Once this unit survives until after the end of the turn in which it enters battle, 2 random enemies with less than 150TU will be stunned for 150TU.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Kirin's Vigor
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

This unit cannot fall asleep if there are any Water enemies on the battlefield. This unit cannot be Stunned if there are any other Storm allies on the battlefield.

This unit will be healed for 30% of its max HP each time an ally gets the turn.

This unit has 50% damage reduction from attacks if this unit has 50%+ of max HP, or if any enemy unit has 100TU or more.

passiveSkillDetails.name: HP Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Attack Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 300 to this unit's Attack.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Sleep Resist Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Reduces the duration of any enemy sleep effects on this unit by 20TU.

leaderSkill.name: Dark Attack Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Dark element units have their Attack increased by 15%.

activeSkills.name: Mega Poison Jolt
activeSkills.description:
250% damage to 2 enemies. 500% damage instead if the user has stealth. This attack ignores the Stealth Status Effect, the Counter Stance Status Effect, and the effects of Skin passive skills. All enemies hit are then granted Mega Poison for 200TU and are Stunned for 30TU. The user is granted Stealth, and a Stealth Shield.

Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on those enemies. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison. Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on the user. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.

activeSkills.name: Shadow Rift
activeSkills.description: Targets 1 enemy. If an enemy is poisoned, deals 400% damage. If the user has survived for 200TU+ on the battlefield, 600% damage instead. This attack ignores any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated, the Counter Stance Status Effect, and the effects of Skin passive skills. The user recovers HP to 100% of its own max if damage is dealt.

activeSkills.name: Crippling Toxin
activeSkills.description:
Stuns 1 Mega Poisoned enemy for 200TU. Then, grants them a Burn Ward and the Lethal Poison status effect for 999TU. These effects can only apply if the target is Mega Poisoned. This skill can be redirected by enemy Stun Absorbers. Usable only if there is no more than 1 enemy with the Lethal Poison status effect on the battlefield, and cannot be used if there is a non-Mega Poisoned enemy Stun Absorber on the battlefield.

Burn Wards prevent Burn from being applied once, then are removed. Burn Wards cannot stack. Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects on that enemy, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning units or Boss units.

activeSkills.name: Lunar Hypnosis
activeSkills.description:
Hypnotizes an enemy with the lowest TU and Mega Poisons them for 200TU. A Hypnotized enemy will use its next turn to grant the turn to and Purify the hypnotizer (the turn will be lost as if it were sleeping), and then the hypnosis will end.

This skill becomes locked for 90TU after use (minus 10TU per Awakening the user has) and cannot be used if an enemy is already Hypnotized or if there are less than 2 enemies on the battlefield. Hypnosis will fail against Boss units. Hypnosis is not a status effect and cannot be removed by Purify skills, but will be canceled if the user is defeated or leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Lunar Venom
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Whenever an enemy enters the battlefield from reinforcements, this unit heals for 20% of its max HP and is granted a Poison Ward and Stealth. Poison Ward prevents Poison from being applied once, then is removed. Poison Wards cannot stack.

If no enemy is Mega Poisoned already, these trigger after each enemy turn:
- Grants a random enemy the Mega Poison status effect for 200TU.
- This unit is healed for 100% of its max HP.
- This unit is granted a Poison Ward and Stealth.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Moon's Shadow
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP. This unit enters battle with Stealth, and a Stealth Shield.

This unit has 65% damage reduction from attacks if this unit has the Stealth status effect.

Triggered when this unit enters the battlefield from the allied reinforcements and when this unit is defeated by an enemy attack:
- All enemies are Stunned for 50TU.
- All enemies are granted Mega Poison for 200TU, this will overwrite other status effects on those units.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Attack Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 300 to this unit's Attack.

passiveSkillDetails.name: HP Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Stun Resist Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Reduces the amount of any stun effects against this unit by 20TU.

leaderSkill.name: Light HP Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Light element units have their max HP increased by 10%.

activeSkills.name: Tandem Takedown
activeSkills.description:
250% damage to 1 enemy. 500% damage instead if another ally on the battlefield has 50TU or less. Then immediately give an ally with the lowest TU (excluding the user) the next turn by reducing their current TU to 0. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects. Damage from this attack does not wake up sleeping enemies.

Active skills that grant turns cannot be used on turns given by this skill. This skill can be used on such turns, but will not grant the extra turn. The given turn is granted after Counter Stance or Counter Skin type effects triggered by this attack, and so the affected ally will act before a countering enemy. Effects that influence TU order may interrupt the given turn (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target).

activeSkills.name: En Garde
activeSkills.description:
Weakens all enemies. The user is Enraged, granted a Sleep Ward, Stun Ward, Poison Ward, Counter Stance for 150TU and 80% damage reduction from attacks until the end of its next turn. Unlocked each time the user damages an enemy with an attack. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

This will overwrite the effects of previous Weak or Enrage skills on affected units, and other status effects on the user. For 150TU, the next time the unit with counter stance takes damage from an enemy attack, it will become their turn. Enraged units have their Attack increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn. Weakened units have their Attack reduced to 0.75x until the end of their next turn. The effect of Weakening may be diminished if the affected unit's Attack is increased by other effects and it can be overwritten by Enrage effects. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

activeSkills.name: Double Phoenix
activeSkills.description: 700% damage to 2 enemies. This attack ignores the Stealth Status Effect. The Hold Ground+ passive skill effect is reset for the user and can be triggered again. Unlocked for one use each time the user's Hold Ground+ passive skill effect is triggered while on the battlefield and can be used only three times per battle.

activeSkills.description:
This attack ignores Guardians. 600% damage to 1 enemy. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects and any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated.

passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit's attacks heal this unit for 100% of total damage dealt.

Whenever another unit on the battlefield damages any unit(s) with an attack, this unit's current TU is reduced by 10TU per unit hit.

Each time an enemy unit gets the turn, if this unit has 150TU or more, this unit will gain the Counter Stance status effect for 150TU at the end of that turn.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Steel Resolve
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated, it instead survives with 1 HP and then cannot be defeated until its next turn. This effect can trigger only once each time this unit enters the battlefield, and is considered a Hold Ground+ effect.

This unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield.

Each time a unit gets the turn while their team has 5+ Spirit, this unit will be healed for 30% of its max HP.

Whenever this unit defeats a non-conjured unit on the battlefield with an attack:
- All allies will be healed for 100% of their max HP.
- All allies will have Burn status effects (including Mega Healing Burn) removed.

This skill can only be used once each time this unit is on the battlefield, and only if there is no other non-Mori Guardian on the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Unsinkable Guard
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit is a Guardian. For any enemy attack that would hit 1 or 2 other allies, this unit has a 100% chance to redirect 1 hit to itself instead. This unit will not redirect skills that don't deal damage.

Whenever this unit or another non-Guardian ally takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn and this unit has any other allies left (even in reinforcements), this unit will:
- Heal for 25% of max HP.
- Gain a Charge.

Whenever this unit would gain a charge while already having 3 Charges, an Imposter is added to the next in line of enemy reinforcements, and a random enemy is granted the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield. This will overwrite other status effects on that unit. Then all Charges are removed from this unit, and it cannot gain any more charges until the following turn. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Anchors Away
passiveSkillDetails.description:
When this unit enters the battlefield from the allied reinforcements and there are no other non-Mori ally Guardians on the battlefield, all allies:
- Are healed for 1000% of this unit's attack.
- Have their current TU reduced by 50TU.
- Gain the Armor status effect. This will overwrite other status effects on those units. Armor grants 50% damage reduction from the next attack, then the effect is removed.

This unit has 10% damage reduction from attacks, plus 10% per Awakening (up to 50% reduction if this unit has 4 Awakenings) until the end of its first turn since entering the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Paint Fall
activeSkillDetails.description:
50% damage to all enemies. This attack ignores damage reduction effects, skin passive skills, the Stealth Status Effect, and the Counter Stance Status Effect. Randomly grants all allies either Stun Wards, or Sleep Wards. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

Then heals all allies for 200% of the user's attack. This triggers once for each Element type that remains on the battlefield.

Unlocked each time the user damages an enemy with another attack. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Stroke of Genius
activeSkillDetails.description: Damage 1 enemy. This attack ignores any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated. 300% damage instead if the user or target have defeated 1 unit with an attack while on the battlefiled. 400% damage instead if the user or target have defeated 2+ units with attacks while on the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Masterpiece
activeSkillDetails.description:
Immediately defeats 1 non-boss enemy, the user is considered to have defeated the target with an attack if successful. This effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, and cannot be redirected by Guardians.

Locked for 300TU after the user has entered the battlefield. This lock is ignored while all 6 Element types are on the battlefield. Usable twice per battle.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Elemental Palette
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit enters battle with a Stun Ward, and Sleep Ward. This unit cannot be defeated by damage from Poison or Burn status effects.

When attacking, adds 100% to the damage % of this unit's attacks for each Element type on the battlefield. (e.g. Paint Fall: 50% => 350% damage when 3 Element types are on the battlefield)

When this unit damages an enemy with an attack, if they are:
- Water or Dark, Stun them for 100TU.
- Fire or Light, grant them the Sleep status effect for 100TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield. Sleep will overwrite other status effects on those units.
- Storm or Earth, grant them the Mega Poison status effect for 100TU. Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on those units. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Legendary Artist
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP. This unit has 50% damage reduction from attacks. This unit has 80% damage reduction from attacks instead if all 6 Element types are on the battlefield.

Each time an ally (including this unit) gets the turn, this unit will be healed for 25% of its max HP. Then this unit will have Sleep status effects removed at the end of the turn.

Whenever another ally gets the turn, if there is a different ally (including Hokusai) that matches their Element on the battlefield, the acting ally will be healed for 25% of their max HP. Then allies gain 1 Spirit at the end of that turn.

When this unit enters the battlefield all allies are granted Elemental Quicken. Units with Elemental Quicken will have their TU costs for all of their skills reduced by 20% while there is a different ally with a matching Element on the battlefield. Whenever another ally enters the battlefield from reinforcements, they are also granted Elemental Quicken. Elemental Quicken will overwrite the effect of previous Quicken skills.

Whenever a non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source, this unit loses 1 Charge.

Then if 4 allies were already on the battlefield, the user sends themself to the back of allied reinforcements.

passiveSkillDetails.name: G.sword Resist Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: 10% less damage from attacks by units equipped with Greatswords.

leaderSkill.name: Fire Attack Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Fire element units have their Attack increased by 15%.

activeSkills.name: Flame Sweep
activeSkills.description: 100% damage to all enemies, 250% damage instead if the user is burning, or to targets that are burning. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect, the effects of Skin passive skills, and heals the user for 100% of total damage dealt. This is not considered a Burn Blast type skill.

activeSkills.name: Binding Flames
activeSkills.description: Burns 1 Enemy, then Stuns them randomly for either 50TU or 200TU if they are Burning. That target is granted a Stun Hex, which will stun all enemies for 100TU at the end of that targets next turn, then be removed. Allies gain 2 Spirit. This skill has no effect if it targets a Water enemy, and is usable only if there is no Stun Hex among enemies. Stun Hexes cannot be purified, and will be removed if the hexed unit is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with burn will also become burned.

activeSkills.name: Death Blow
activeSkills.description:
750% damage to 1 enemy. The user gains the Mega Healing Burn status effect for 100TU if the user is not burning. This attack ignores effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated. Usable only if all enemies on the battlefield are burning or if the user is not burning.

A unit with Mega Healing Burn will heal after each turn at 20 times the rate as Healing Burn. This will overwrite other status effects on the user, cannot be overwritten by Burn, Poison or Sleep status effects, and cannot be Purified. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with Mega Healing Burn will gain the Burn status effect. A unit with Mega Healing Burn will be granted Healing Burn for 300TU when Mega Healing Burn expires.

activeSkills.name: Hell's Judgement
activeSkills.description:
500% damage to 2 enemies, and the user will also Endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1HP. Endure effects cannot stack. This attack ignores damage reduction effects.

At the end of the turn, allies that are either Fire element or have Burn Blast or Burn Drive type active skills will gain the Burn status effect, and all other allies will have Burn removed. Unlocked each time a non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Hellish Wildfire
passiveSkillDetails.description:
At the end of each turn, this unit grants a random non-burning, non-water ally on the battlefield the burn status effect. Then a random burning ally will heal for 30% of their max HP.

At the end of each other ally turn, if all ally units are burning, this unit will immediately get the next turn by having its TU reduced to 0, then this effect cannot trigger again until 20TU advances.

All Fire Allies and Allies with Burn Blast and Burn Drive type active skills are Quickened by 30% when this unit enters the battlefield, or when those allies enter from reinforcements while this unit is on the battlefield. This will overwrite the effects of other Quicken skills on affected units.

passiveSkillDetails.name: HP Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.description: 10% less damage from attacks by Fire units.

leaderSkill.name: Dark Attack Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Dark element units have their Attack increased by 15%.

activeSkills.name: Toxic Shot
activeSkills.description:
50% damage to 1 enemy. 500% damage instead if the user's HP is at 75%+. Grants the target the Super Poison status effect. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect, the effects of Skin passive skills, and steals up to 3 Spirit from enemies.

Super Poison will overwrite other status effects on those enemies. Super Poison deals 4 times the damage of normal poison, and cannot be overwritten by normal poison.

activeSkills.name: Time Desecrator
activeSkills.description:
100% damage to 1 enemy. If the target has 50+ TU, deals 400% damage instead and grants the Mega Poison status effect for 200TU. 600% damage instead with Mega Poison if the target has 100+ TU. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects. The user is granted Poison and Burn wards.

Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack. Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on that enemy. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison.

activeSkills.name: Unleash Hell
activeSkills.description:
300% damage to all enemies. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect and the effects of Skin passive skills. 450% damage if the user has defeated 1 unit with an attack while on the battlefield, 600% if the user has defeated 2+ units. Grants all Mega Poisoned enemies Lethal Poison for 999TU. Then, grants all Super Poisoned enemies Mega Poison for 200TU. Then grants Super Poison to all other enemies that were hit.

Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning units or Boss units.

activeSkills.description: Stuns 2 enemies for 100TU and grants them the Mega Poison status effect for 200TU. This skill can be redirected by enemy Stun Absorbers. This skill becomes locked for 50TU after use.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Steady Aim
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit cannot fall asleep if there are any Water enemies on the battlefield. Each time a poisoned enemy gets the turn, this unit heals for 20% of its max HP.

If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

If this unit damages at least one enemy with 100+TU with an attack, this unit will get another turn. Damaged targets cannot trigger this effect again until TU advances. Effects that influence TU order may interrupt the extra turn (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target).

passiveSkillDetails.name: Awakened Blade
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

This unit heals for 10% of max HP, each time an ally hits an enemy with an attack.

Whenever an ally Mori enters the battlefield from reinforcements, this unit heals 10% of max HP.

Whenever a non-sleeping ally gets the turn, this unit will gain Stealth and a Stealth Shield at the end of that turn. Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on the user. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.
